text: (Soshite ose rareta. ) `Moshi anata gataga zen o okonaunara, jibun no mi no tame ni zen o okonau nodeari, mata aku o okonatte mo, jibun no tame (ni okonau no)dearu.' Sorede 2-banme no toki ga kita toki, anata gata no kao wa kumori, saisho no toki no yo ni, kare-ra wa masujido ni shin'nyu shi, subete wa kare-ra ni yotte tettei shite fuminijira re kaimetsu ni ki shita
